mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (keyword, title, originallink, link, description, pubDate) VALUES(#{keyword}, #{title}, #{originallink}, #{link},#{description}, #{pubDate})
INSERT INTO youtube (keyword, title, videoId) VALUES (#{keyword},#{title},#{videoId})

INSERT INTO books (user_id, title, link, image, author, discount, publisher, pubdate, isbn, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{link}, #{image}, #{author}, #{discount}, #{publisher}, #{pubdate}, #{isbn}, #{description})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM books WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND isbn = #{isbn} AND title = #{title}
mapper.select: SELECT id, keyword, title, originallink, link, description, pubDate FROM news WHERE keyword = #{keyword}
SELECT id, keyword, title, videoId FROM youtube WHERE keyword = #{keyword} LIMIT 4
